website_summaries.verdict: This weighty draft stopper is filled with natural buckwheat hulls, so it doesn't release any odors or chemicals.
pros: Cotton fabric draft stopper filled with natural buckwheat hulls
Measures 38 inches long and 3 inches high
Hulls give even filling without lumps or bulges
cons: Pricey, and does not have a hanging loop for easy storage

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Good weight to stay in place, good length for standard front door. Material and colors as expected. Used it for a couple of months now and we can tell there is less drafty cold air. Does the job. 'Wish that more modern patterns or colors were available.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: Too Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star because it really does not work well at all. There is too much stuffing in the thing so it cannot be shoved flush against the bottom of the door. It just does not conform very well at all to the space that needs blocking. I may as well slit it open and take some of the stuffing out to see if it works any better. Would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye67

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong buying the Chickadee draftstopper.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these in my house. I wouldn't buy them from anywhere else. This is the perfect size and thickness to stop drafty air from coming into your home. The production line and customer service are the best. Can't say enough about The Maine Sales Company and these Chickadee draft stoppers - just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The draft dodger works very well. It keeps the drafts from my cold deck from creeping under the door, and also looks very attractive as it does it's job. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Plus I love the fabric and appreciate the way everything is evenly ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair to help block the drafts in my 1920s Craftsman -- and they do the trick. Plus I love the fabric and appreciate the way everything is evenly constructed -- no bulges or high and low spots. Good quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tungate

customer_reviews.title: Nice draft stopper
customer_reviews.text: The draft is completely stopped by this charming door draft ... and it's an added feature that if anyone comes in unannounced, well, they can't get in cuz the door draft doesn't roll :)

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and no added smells. I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and no added smells. I can't handle sachets with pine or lavender - many are way too overpowering and this does the job without the smell and it's attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: lorenv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fix for cold air coming under an exterior door
customer_reviews.text: I used this to stop cold air coming in under our front door in winter. This is an easy and effective solution. The product is heavy and flexiable of it stay out exactly where you want it. Before purchasing, we measured the width of our door and bought a size that fits all the way across.

customer_reviews.title: ... apartment door to keep out the noise and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This one we keep at our apartment door to keep out the noise and works great.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite because it is the longest and by far the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three different draft blockers of this type. This is my favorite because it is the longest and by far the one with the most bulk. That is, it does the best job of keeping out the cold air because of its length and accommodating volume.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as advertised. A bit disappointed ....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, good quality. Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: D  Delacoeur

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a noise blocker!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!!! I live in an apartment, and there is a nice gap between the bottom of my metal apartment door and the floor. My neighbor's kids don't have "indoor voices", and she is constantly screaming at them, and they scream right back at her. This WONDERFUL draft stopper not only blocks all the cold air from coming in my apartment, it muffles all that obnoxiousness. You can still hear the neighbors across the hall a little bit, but at a much LOWER volume. THANK YOU!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Buy made in America!
customer_reviews.text: I always try to buy products that are made in the US. This great draft stopper fits the ticket in more ways than 1. The draft stopper is excellent quality with great workmanship! The draft stopper is very thick. It is longer than a 36" door so you can really tuck it in at the floor. Living in a 100 year old + house has it's challenges. But the Maine Sales Company came to the rescue with the draft stopper!
customer_reviews.author: jen villelli

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Weight than Expected, but Works
customer_reviews.text: While other reviews said this was a weightier option than others on Amazon, I still found this to be lighter weight than expected for the price. It does function to stop air (you can feel the cold on it when it's removed) but, again, I wish it had more weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Draft Stopper
customer_reviews.text: This draft stopper does just that. It fits firmly against the bottom of the door, stays snugly in place and its filling doesn't add an unwanted fragrance to my mud room. It's winter attractive without being a "holiday" theme. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize these were made now with cotton inside and its so light weight like a pillow which defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is actually heavy weighted, exactly what I was looking for! I didn't realize these were made now with cotton inside and its so light weight like a pillow which defeats the purpose. This stays nice in place and I love the pattern. Perfect for my laundry room to block a draft from our backdoor. Shipping was super quick and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a door with a large transition piece in front of it. The buckwheat works great to actually get in there. Foam would just sit in top.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carnley

customer_reviews.title: Provides solid draft blocking
customer_reviews.text: This door draft blocker is well made. The cloth shell is sturdy and attractive, and the filling is packed solidly into the shell. Placed against the door bottom, the blocker provides excellent protection against drafts.
customer_reviews.author: mishapolkamom

customer_reviews.title: A really great and long and firm door draft
customer_reviews.text: A really great and long and firm door draft.I wish it was a little longer as I have a wide opening.Very pleasing cloth pattern and fits sniffly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Danna

customer_reviews.title: The design is what caught my attention it is pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for the front door. I was hoping it would had some weight to it for the price. Really did not work well there but found it did work well at another entrance which was a flat surface. The design is what caught my attention it is pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I collect chickadee stuff, so this fits right in. Quality seems ok. It is a little long for most exterior doors, which is why I gave it a four.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric. Works well to keep roomba from getting hung up on the back of my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking and a good protection
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughters' family at Christmas time. They were in need of a new one. This one is lovely and does the trick keeping out the wind that comes under the door.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Ag

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have the draft stopper by my front door and it keeps the draft out. Good quality and nice bird design on fabric.

customer_reviews.title: worked great and was delivered as
customer_reviews.text: Product matched the description, worked great and was delivered as promised

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and generous in diameter to keep out draft and noise!

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money

product_meta.title: The Maine Sales Company Door Draft, Light, Dust, Odor Stopper, 3" X 38" All Natural Unscented, Chickadees
product_meta.description: Stops cold and heat at your door. Also useful to keep noise, pollution, light, odors, and dust out of your environment. Very attractive addition to your décor.
feature_bullets: Diameters: 2”- 3”- 4” cover a 1” gap, 3” – 4” cover a 1.5” gap, 4” covers a 2” gap (Space below door). Our large diameter draft stoppers work fine for smaller gaps, and the bigger ones also show up more to be enjoyed visually. Door sills can require a larger diameter because they elevate the gap to be blocked. Look at the sizing diagram in this listing to get the best fit. Choose the correct size.

Traditional one-sided draft stopper for the best seal. They are all we will sell. Be sure to measure. Always purchase a draft stopper that is a little longer than the space to fill. Get a natural pliable filling.

Grown and sewn in the USA – All-natural chemical free clean buckwheat hull filling. Our buckwheat hulls are an excellent filling because they are a heavy enough and are pliable. No inserted small pockets of beads or sand needed. Even weight along the entire length provides the best seal. Our exclusive winnowing (cleaning) process provides the cleanest hulls possible. Our hull cracking process provides a denser, heavier filling.

No loops. Stoppers long enough to properly seal are too long to hang on a door knob. They drag and get caught in the door. Grab ours in the middle, shift the filling, and hang in the closet. Also, no attaching to the door. Sounds good in theory, but they don’t stay on unless they are very light weight, if one does stay on, it gets dirty from sweeping the floor all day. Dual draft stoppers are small, light and stiff, they are notoriously bad at blocking drafts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
